displayName.text: Penstein Dermatology; Alyson C Penstein MD, Adam K. Penstein, MD

formattedAddress: 116 E 66th St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 116 E 66th St, New York, NY 10065-6547, USA

originalText.text: I could not trust anybody’s opinion more if I tried. Dr. Penstein truly gives the best and well thought out “plan of action” so to speak with any issue regarding my skin. Her attitude is always so wonderful and positive. She truly cares about her patients. The team here is so loving and kind as well. The best.

text.text: I could not trust anybody’s opinion more if I tried. Dr. Penstein truly gives the best and well thought out “plan of action” so to speak with any issue regarding my skin. Her attitude is always so wonderful and positive. She truly cares about her patients. The team here is so loving and kind as well. The best.

originalText.text: Dr. Penstein is truly the best dermatologist. My family has been using him for years. He really cares about his patients. His assistant Melody makes you feel so comfortable and at ease during every visit. Don’t go anywhere else

text.text: Dr. Penstein is truly the best dermatologist. My family has been using him for years. He really cares about his patients. His assistant Melody makes you feel so comfortable and at ease during every visit. Don’t go anywhere else

originalText.text: I've been seeing Dr. Adam Penstein for years and absolutely love being in his care. Never a long wait and his office is extremely clean. The nurses are great too and have been with him for a long time. All around great office and I highly recommend him as a dermatologist.

text.text: I've been seeing Dr. Adam Penstein for years and absolutely love being in his care. Never a long wait and his office is extremely clean. The nurses are great too and have been with him for a long time. All around great office and I highly recommend him as a dermatologist.

originalText.text:
I appreciated very much that Dr Penstein did not rush me out of the examining room and addressed all my concerns with patience. The Doctor was very deliberate in assessing the problem and assuredly prescribed medication that cured me very quickly.  My appointment time was honored within 5 minutes
of the appointed time.  How unusual , and very much appreciated.  The office staff was friendly and professional.  I was very impressed with Dr. Penstein, , an excellent Dermatologist.

originalText.text: Dr Penstein and staff are the best!! She is a wonderful caring physician with a great and skilled staff.  Dr Penstein wants to  help you look your best - whether its acne or aging- she knows the best techniques!  She is also a really nice lady!
